body: This seems superfluous with the ToC on the left, no?
diff_hunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,550 @@
+Configuration with OSG-Configure

+-   [About this document](#about-this-document)

+        -   [SGE](#sge)

+    -   Monitoring/reporting:
